title: Low rank high fun - looking for bronze/silver ranked buddies
body: Just want a few decent bronze/silver players who don't get salty and just wanna play for fun. 2 steps forward 1 step back is still going forward

replies.body:
sounds cool! heads up though i'm legit trash at the game, lol.
But if you're up for playing  a bit, add me! Summoner Name: Jewish Atheist {{champion:432}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
